title: Whenever I log into the league of legends WEBSITE, my chrome exits itself.
body:
Title.

I just open it back up and everything's fine. :/

replies.body:
That's really weird! Does this happen if you log into the League website while using *Incognito Mode*?

Let me know!

Doesn't seem to.

I know, it's really strange :/

In most configurations, your Chrome extensions won't run in Incognito. Since this works fine in incognito, there's likely a conflict with one or more of your browser extensions and the League site. Try [**disabling your browser extensions**](https://support.google.com/chrome_webstore/answer/2664769?hl=en) one by one to figure out which one may be causing this issue.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
